name: Circle Shade Analysis
description:
Given a square ABCD, a circle with a radius equal to the side length of the square is

drawn from vertex B. This circle touches another circle drawn from vertex D at point P 

![Description image](https://i.imgur.com/rXDxQYu.png)


Find the area of the shaded figure in the image, if the side length of the square is equal to ùëé.
